data.title: NetSuite Licensed Reseller and Partner
data.meta_description: Premier NetSuite reseller & partner GSI, Inc. offers expert solutions for optimal business performance. Trust GSI for seamless NetSuite implementations & support.
data.text:
GSI, Inc. - Your Official NetSuite Reseller & Partner

GSI is the leading NetSuite reseller (G2), alliance partner, and solution provider known for its expertise with Oracle NetSuite implementations, integrations, customizations, and support services. Our dedicated team collaborates closely with our clients to tailor solutions to drive optimal performance for their business.

With our proven track record and comprehensive understanding of NetSuite's capabilities, GSI is your trusted partner in navigating the cloud-ERP landscape and empowering businesses to succeed.

Want to deploy NetSuite? Get in touch with our team today!

NetSuite's licensing cost begins with the concept of a “suite". The type of suite you will need to license is formulated by the type of features you may want to deploy and the size of your organization.

For instance, in terms of the capacity required to be used within NetSuite; NetSuite categorizes these into three “levels” of Suites. These suites are NetSuite Limited/Starter Edition, NetSuite Mid-Market/Standard Edition, and NetSuite Enterprise/Premium Edition.

As your company expands, you simply acclimate your NetSuite subscription to meet your requirements; the transition is flawless. With NetSuite licensing, you never have to get anxious about a system migration once you've outperformed your current edition; you can simply just modify your licensing model.

NetSuite - Business Value Assessment

The GSI Business Value Assessment (BVA) service helps C-level and IT executives conduct a strategic review of their business needs to ensure their NetSuite Solution is being fully utilized and not hindering their growth. The Business Value Assessment service is based on GSI’s extensive NetSuite knowledge across various industries and projects, such as implementations, upgrades, migrations, and services for organizations of all sizes and across numerous industry segments. It entails an initial consultation that analyzes a company’s current business situation; market, geographic, online and mobile growth plans; and a comprehensive review of their current software infrastructure and IT road map.

The GSI team then conducts a business analysis review, matching up the company’s business needs with capabilities and actual usage of their current software. Finally, GSI delivers a customized assessment that matches business growth and opportunity costs against the economics of their current software, the cost of a potential upgrade and/or the wisdom of complementing their system with a third-party software solution.

Future-Proof Your Business with GSI

Ready to Transform Your Business with NetSuite?

Don't wait to improve your business operations. Contact us today for a free consultation and discover how NetSuite can bring efficiency and growth to your enterprise.
